modmenu.descriptionTranslation.viafabric: Fabric mod to connect to EVERY Minecraft server version (Release, Beta, Alpha, Classic, Snapshots, Bedrock) with QoL fixes to the gameplay
base.viafabricplus.something_went_wrong: Something went wrong! Please try again later
base.viafabricplus.force_version_title: Please select the version with which the server should be pinged/connected
general_settings.viafabricplus.extra_inf: Show extra information in Debug HUD
general_settings.viafabricplus.show_clas: Show classic loading progress in connect screen
general_settings.viafabricplus.filter_cr: Remove unavailable items from creative tab
general_settings.viafabricplus.load_skin: Load skins and skulls in legacy versions
general_settings.viafabricplus.emulate_i: Emulate inventory actions in alpha versions
bedrock_settings.viafabricplus.click_to_: Click to set account for Bedrock Edition
bedrock_settings.viafabricplus.replace_d: Replace default port in server list
authentication_settings.viafabricplus.ve: Verify session for online mode servers
authentication_settings.viafabricplus.au: Automatically select CPE when using the ClassiCube server list
authentication_settings.viafabricplus.se: Set session name to ClassiCube name when using the ClassiCube server list
visual_settings.viafabricplus.remove_new: Remove newer features from the Jigsaw screen
visual_settings.viafabricplus.replace_pe: Replace petrified oak slab texture with the 'unknown' texture
visual_settings.viafabricplus.remove_new: Remove newer features from the Command Block screen
visual_settings.viafabricplus.replace_hu: Replace hurt sound with OOF sound
bedrock.viafabricplus.login:
Your browser should have opened.
Closing this screen will cancel the process!
authentication.viafabricplus.failed_to_v: ViaFabricPlus couldn't verify your session! Please log in to an account or disable the BetaCraft authentication in the ViaFabricPlus Settings
classicube.viafabricplus.account: You can create an account here: https://www.classicube.net/
classicube.viafabricplus.loading: Loading profile information and server list...
classicube.viafabricplus.warning: This feature will send API requests to the ClassiCube API.
betacraft.viafabricplus.warning: Pressing this button will send API requests to "betacraft.uk/serverlist".
classic4j_library.viafabricplus.error.to: Incorrect token. Is your ViaFabricPlus out of date?
classic4j_library.viafabricplus.error.ve: User hasn't verified their email address yet.
classic4j_library.viafabricplus.error.lo: Multi-factor authentication requested. Please check your email.
